fields.description: We are writing Unit test cases for Appcelerator app using Ti mocha and chai, Is there any tool which used for code coverage of unit test cases.
fields.summary: Code Coverage tool for unit test cases ?

comments.body: In our SDK, we calculate the coverage manually, based on all API namespaces vs. tested API's. I'm not aware of any client-side coverage frameworks for Titanium but there might be general JS-libs that you could apply as well. Also feel free to ask the community for tips on [Ti.Slack|http://tislack.org]. Thx!

We tried  Istanbul to check unit test cases coverage but it's giving an error
